title: HCG Pack
description:
HCG pack from old and not-so-old h-games.
BMPs are in "ll" folder (alias for lossless).

See http://aaa.xost.ru/hcg.mdb for detailed listing and readme.txt for notes.
Find what you need, grab it, burn it, share it. 

 

//readme.txt

1. I ripped none of these. Others did it. Also, "I-ripped-it-give-me-credit" 
  text files were annoying (no useful information at all) so I deleted them.
  Most hcgs came from hongfire members.

2. HCGs are in bmp->7z->rar+rr5% format. Bmp-7z combo is the best for 
  compressing lossless images. Rar is only for recovery record (half a year 
  ago I lost one hcg set because of a bad cluster)

3. Several hcgs are reconverted jpg images. I did that for better compression.

4. See included mdb database for full listing.

5. I did not recheck any &#039;short&#039; or romaji names.
  Accept them and change to whatever you think is right.
  Best way to look up a game - by getchu num and japname.

6. Jpg sets are "temporary" and are subject to change. Therefore I won&#039;t be 
  able to fully reseed the torrent in future.

7. &#039;ll&#039; is alias for &#039;lossless&#039;. BMPs are there.

8. Please leave info.txt and url link intact when redistributing. Or make your own.
  It&#039;t always useful to know exactly what game cg is this.

You can find me at www.hongfire.com forums.
Sorry for my broken english.
Enjoy the pics.
